name: The Randomness of a Rolling Die
name_original: The Randomness of a Rolling Die
description:
Important: It has no loading bar (for some reason) either wait around 10 secs or reload after 5. Roll your own head to get random abilities! Every time you bash your head on a post, you will gain a random ability out of 6 to finish the puzzle! WASD to move around. Made in the GMTK Game Jam in 48 hours.

Music linked here: https://uppbeat.io/track/zimpzon/calm
